summary: Personal website/About Me page update: convert 'Skills and Services' section into a 'Skills' page and update listed skills/projects.

existing_features.title:
Update `frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/SkillsServicesPage.tsx` to remove the Services section entirely and replace the Skills content with these sections:
- Core Skills â†’ Programming Languages: a bulleted list containing Java, Python, C, Dart, JavaScript
- Projects Built: a list containing Mini Amazon (Java), Mini Tally (Java), Mini Calculator (C), Period Tracker (Dart)
- Extra Skills: a list containing Poet, Writer

Change the Skills page heading text from "Skills & Services" to "Skills" in `frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/SkillsServicesPage.tsx`, and remove 'Services' from any related page labeling used for navigation/table of contents by updating the title in `frontend/src/features/portfolio/portfolioPages.tsx` from "Skills & Services" to "Skills".

new_feature_requests.summary: Update Skills page content: core programming languages (bulleted), projects built list, extra skills; remove 'Services' from page heading (Skills only).

projectName: Convert Skills & Services page into Skills page with updated content
